comment: He explains the topics very good, Study the HW that he assign for the test and you will do good, be on time with your homework...the homework is basically the test, He is an excellent teacher take him if you can his labs are awesome too. I would recommend 100%
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Great professor. Lectures are boring, but the homework is similar to the powerpoints, and the tests are similar to the homework. So as long as you study the homework, you will get an A on the test. Some test questions are directly from the homework. He is very nice and cares a lot about his students. FE formula sheet is provided for the exams.

This professor truly does want you to succeed in this course. He will set aside time to meet with the student to offers extra help/credit if needed. A very understanding and good professor. Attendance was not mandatory but highly recommend as a lot of the example problems he gives are similar to the tests!

Explained the concepts/formulas needed for each lab, and lab reports were simple. Lab quizzes are super easy as long as you read the manual and show up. We did 2 labs since it was 8 weeks and still got out within ~2 hours every meeting.
Nice guy. Will work with you. Wants you to learn. I will take again.

Very nice and caring. He added an extra test because a lot of people didn't do well on the first one. The tests were all examples from the slides and he reviews the class before the test. The homework was easy and from the slides. No quizzes. Always willing to help and answer questions. Responds quickly to emails.
